service.name: marketplace
service.description: Server to provide services for other amun user. The core service can be used to download services from an marketplace
service.author: Christoph Kappestein <k42b3.x@gmail.com>

database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.marketplace}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `status` int(10) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `link` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `author` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `license` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `version` varchar(16) NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `source` (`source`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
